welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fairview Park, a charming city known for its scenic parks, friendly locals, and rich cultural heritage. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all the beauty and excitement our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hopkins International Airport is the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is used for all domestic flights operated by major airlines such as American Airlines and Delta.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is used for all international flights and some domestic flights operated by United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport serves commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
